page.title: 19RELIGION IN CANFORD MAGNA
page.content: The churches have no choir,but have an orchestra and three music groups for all musical activities.There are 43 bible-study groups with 350-400 memb- ers,which meet individually in members homes,but all groups meet fortnightly at the LANTERN also.Youth is catered for by the"Climbers"(under 8s)who meet weekly alternately at the village hall and The Lantern,as also do the "Explorers"(8-11yrs)."Pathfinders"are the 11-14 group,single-sex groups,meet mid-week at the Lantern.15-20 yr olds (The Magnets) meet in mixed groups aft er church on Sunday nights,so do the "After Eights"(over 20s).About 7 att- end the Mother and Toddlers group on Tuesday afternoons and about 30 child- ren take part in the activities of the twice weekly play- group.
